remarks: An Axiom of Choice equivalent: the infinite Cartesian product of nonempty classes is nonempty.  Axiom of Choice (second form) of [Enderton] p. 55 and its converse.  This is a stronger version of the axiom in Enderton, with no existence requirement for the family of classes ` B ( x ) ` (achieved via the Collection Principle ~ cp ). (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2006.)
